long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser bookmark enhancement extension
You can open this extension and type in the keywords to search for the bookmark you want to open. The query condition supports the bookmark url, the bookmark name, and the name of the directory where the bookmark is located.

This extension supports shortcut keys to quickly open bookmarks. 
Under Windows operating system, the shortcut keys for opening bookmarks are Enter, Ctrl + 0 ~ Ctrl + 9; 
Under Mac operating system, the shortcut key for opening bookmarks is Enter, ⌘ + 0 ~ ⌘ + 9.
You can quickly scroll up and down with Ctrl + N/Ctrl + P.

You can set the shortcuts for this plugin in the Extensions - Keyboard Shortcuts menu so that you can open the bookmarks you want to open just by keyboard operation.
